message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given its features and your specific needs. I'm initially proposing a price of $11,500. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this product would be a great addition to my collection, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  However,  $9,500 is significantly below its true value and what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? This considers both our needs.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
